channel.title: Music – Freddy Fender
channel.description: Recent content in Freddy Fender on Music

item.title: Freddy Fender - Before The Next Teardrop Falls
item.description:
작곡: Keith Vivian / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8336 / KY: 7443

If he brings you
happiness
Then I wish you
all the best
It’s your happiness
that matter
Most of all
But if he ever
Breaks your heart
If the teardrops
Ever star
I’ll be there
Before the next
teardrop falls
Tho’ it hurts to
let you go
Darling
I want you to know
That I’ll stand by
you if ever
You should call
and if I
Should ever hear
that he made
You shed a tear
I’ll be there
Before the next
teardrop falls
I’ll be there anytime
you need me
By your side
to dry away
Every teardrop
that you cried
And If he ever
leaves you blue
Just remember
I love you
And I’ll be there
before the next
Teardrop falls
and I’ll be there
Before the next
teardrop falls-
